first.name: Jimmy
first.content: Hi!| This is the first time we met.| Nice to meet you!

repeat.name: Jimmy
repeat.content: Hello.| Nice to see you again.| I hope you're doing well.

0.name: John
0.content: This is just a formated text.@|You can use [b]bold[/b]|, [i]italic[/i]|, [b][i]bold and italic[/i][/b] or any bbcode style you want ||(even [color=red]c[/color][color=#ff7800]o[/color][color=yellow]l[/color][color=lime]o[/color][color=#00f1ff]r[/color][color=#c200ff]s[/color]!).@|Just be sure to set the fonts for other styles if you want to use them.

1.name: John
1.content: And remeber to not overdo the p|a|u|s|e|s|.
